bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of a discharge of yellow liquid by women from their urinary tract. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dao 稻 quotes Jing xiao chan bao 經效產寶 : 胎動不安：下黃水。用糯米一合，黃芪、芎藭各 五錢，水一升，煎八合，分服 , “When the fetus moves and [patients] discharge yellow water , use polished glutinous rice, 1 ge , huang qi , xiong qiong , 5 qian each, boil in 1 sheng of water down to 8 ge . Ingest in several portions”.

②Discharge of yellow liquid from a lesion. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry she rui cao 蛇芮草：主 蛇虺及毒蟲等螫。取根、葉搗傅咬處，當下黃水 , “It controls the effects of poisonous snake bites. Take the root and the leaves, pound them and apply the pulp to the bitten area. This will discharge yellow water ”.
